summary: It all begins with a mistake, an error with serious consequences: in a hospital the new-born babies of an Austrian couple and a Turkish family of immigrant workers are mixed up and go home ... See full summary »
cast: Julia Stemberger|Karl Markovics|Meltem Cumbul|Ahmet Ugurlu|Josef Hader|Karoline Zeisler|Petra Marjam|Franz Friedrich|Edith Nordegg|Maximilian Pretterebner|Philipp Schwab|Anna-Katharina Pretterebner|Sebastian Schubert|Metin Çeliker|Suna Selen|Burhan Ince|Erdem Ergin|Robert Hunger-Bühler|Wolfgang Böck|Rudolf Knor|John Ottwald|Houchang Allahyari|Werner Heger|Marion Dimali|Jeanette Rosenmaier|Gabriela Schmoll|Marion Rottenhofer|Monika Finotti|Lotte Loebenstein|Thomas Morris|Ronald Hein|Haymon Maria Buttinger|Jonathan Berkh|Michael Lakner|Hermann Scheidleder|Eva Klemt|Aloisia Hatzi|Cengiz Keskinkilic|Mehmet Akcin|Halil Hamevioglu
title: Geboren in Absurdistan
